pages.text: In certain modes (Connection/Hydraulics) there exists a "Snap Mode", usually as a secondary toolgun mode. This mode allows you to snap one ship to another. It also respects "HitPos Modes".$(br)To use: 1. Set position of the first ship. 2. Set to which position snap second ship. 3. Use scroll wheel to rotate first ship, before finalizing.$(br)Custom Parameters:$(li)$(l)Distance From Block$() - Final distance from block.$(li)$(l)Snap Mode Scroll Step$() - Scroll wheel step in degrees.
